perturbation.original_text: This Amendment shall enter into force on the date of its signature by both Parties and, unless otherwise agreed upon in writing by the Parties through a subsequent amendment to the GMA, shall remain in force for the term of the referenced GMA.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment shall enter into force on the date of its signature by both Parties. The duration of this amendment will be determined on a project-by-project basis and subject to the discretion of ATR, regardless of the term of the referenced GMA.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that the Amendment remains in force for the term of the GMA. The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating the duration is determined on a project-by-project basis at ATR's discretion, contradicting the initial fixed term and creating ambiguity around the duration obligations.

perturbation.original_text: This Clause 4 shall survive termination or expiry of this Amendment for a period of five (5) years following such End Date.
perturbation.changed_text: This Clause 4 shall survive termination or expiry of this Amendment indefinitely, unless both parties agree to terminate the confidentiality obligations earlier, but this agreement is at the sole discretion of AZUL.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the Confidentiality clause lasts for five years after the contract's end. The modified text creates a contradiction by stating that it lasts indefinitely, unless both parties agree to end the agreement, making it unclear what the duration is. This allows AZUL to have complete discretion over the confidentiality obligations.

perturbation.original_text: This Amendment contains the entire agreement between the Parties regarding the subject-matter and shall supersede any previous understandings, commitments and/or representations whatsoever oral or written.
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment contains the core understanding between the Parties regarding the subject-matter, however, previous oral agreements or understandings may still be considered valid and binding at the discretion of the Repairer (ATR).
perturbation.explanation: The original text contains an integration clause where everything before this agreement is superseded. The changed text says that oral agreements can still be considered valid, creating ambiguity and contradicting the previous statement.
